attributes.additional_details:
It will decrease social mobility for children in london, only allowing them to attend schools at close proximity.
Families with lower incomes will be hit worse as they have to provide travel for themselves as well as their children
It will impact on other services for young people this includes e.g. youth groups, summer schools, etc; Which are essential to building skills and interests and character in young people 
This will only halt the development of children in this country
attributes.background: To allow free travel for under 18s to continue!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331453
